humanum_full_description_en:
A bronze inscription from " Xi " from " product ", " Xi " in Oracle and early Bronze in the absence of a cross, or from twenty years before " 𠃊 " from " Xi " word justice always told about the hidden meaning ，The original meaning of “ stealth ” in the seal script is from "品" to "匸" "Shuowen": "Districts, embarrassing areas, hiding. From the product, in the womb. Product, the public."

Inscriptions are used as place names, such as "The Collection" 685: "Wang Qishou District", " shou " means hunting, the whole sentence means that the king hunted in the district; it is also suspected to be used as a sacrifice name, such as "Tunnan" 629: "弜区", "弜" is used as " do not ".

Bronze inscriptions are used as place names and are commonly used as " qu ", such as Zihezi Keke: "Gufu", pronounced "Qufu".

The Warring States character " area " is also used as a surname, or as " ou ", which is found in "The Genealogy of Wanxing".

Ancient books are commonly used as " Ou ", such as "Historical Records. "Biography of the Xiongnu": "Each side is Ou Tuo", "Ou Tuo" refers to the earth room where the ancient ethnic minorities garrison or guard, "Han Shu. "Su Wu Zhuan" "Ou Tuo" as "District Tuo".
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jinwen from "匸" (or " 𠃊 ") from "品", seal text from "品" in "匸", the original meaning of hiding.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「匸」從「品」，「匸」在甲骨文和早期金文中，上缺一橫，故曰或從「𠃊」，從「匸」取義的字常跟隱藏義有關，篆文從「品」在「匸」中，本義為藏匿。《說文》：「區，踦區，藏匿也。从品，在匸中。品，眾也。」

　　卜辭用作地名，如《合集》685正：「王其狩區」，「狩」為狩獵，全句意謂王在區地打獵；又疑用作祭名，如《屯南》629：「弜區」，「弜」用如「勿」。

　　金文用作地名，通作「曲」，如子禾子釜：「區夫」，讀作「曲阜」。

　　戰國文字「區」也用作姓氏，或作「歐」，見於《萬姓統譜》。

　　古書通作「甌」，如《史記．匈奴列傳》：「各居其邊為甌脫」，「甌脫」指古代少數民族屯戍或守望的土室，《漢書．蘇武傳》「甌脫」作「區脫」。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「匸」（或「𠃊」）從「品」，篆文從「品」在「匸」中，本義為藏匿。

甲金文從「 匸 」從「 品 」，「 匸 」在甲骨文和早期金文中，上缺一橫，故曰或從「 𠃊 」，從「 匸 」取義的字常跟隱藏義有關，篆文從「 品 」在「 匸 」中，本義為藏匿。《說文》：「區，踦區，藏匿也。从品，在匸中。品，眾也。」 卜辭用作地名，如《合集》685正：「王其狩區」，「 狩 」為狩獵，全句意謂王在區地打獵；又疑用作祭名，如《屯南》629：「弜區」，「 弜 」用如「 勿 」。 金文用作地名，通作「 曲 」，如子禾子釜：「區夫」，讀作「曲阜」。 戰國文字「 區 」也用作姓氏，或作「 歐 」，見於《萬姓統譜》。 古書通作「 甌 」，如《史記．匈奴列傳》：「各居其邊為甌脫」，「甌脫」指古代少數民族屯戍或守望的土室，《漢書．蘇武傳》「甌脫」作「區脫」。

From the product, in the womb. Product, the public." Inscriptions are used as place names, such as "The Collection" 685: "Wang Qishou District", " shou" means hunting, the whole sentence means that the king hunted in the district; it is also suspected to be used as a sacrifice name, such as "Tunnan" 629: "弜区", " 弜" is used as " do not". Bronze inscriptions are used as place names and are commonly used as " qu", such as Zihezi Keke: "Gufu", pronounced "Qufu". The Warring States character " area" is also used as a surname, or as " ou", which is found in "The Genealogy of Wanxing". Ancient books are commonly used as " Ou", such as "Historical Records. "Biography of the Xiongnu": "Each side is Ou Tuo", "Ou Tuo" refers to the earth room where the ancient ethnic minorities garrison or guard, "Han Shu. "Su Wu Zhuan" "Ou Tuo" as "District Tuo".

區字的基本解释

區
qū

區
ōu
均见“区”。

區字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》豈俱切，平虞，溪。］
“区1”的繁体字。
(1)隐匿。
(2)区域。有一定界限的地方或范畴。
(3)行政区划单位。
(4)指区政府及其所在地。
(5)住宅。
(6)专指小屋。
(7)畦；畦田。
(8)区别；划分。
(9)小，微小。
(10)量词。白玉五双谓之“区”。
(11)量词。所；处。
(12)量词。座；尊。
(13)通“驅”。
[②]［ōu］
［《廣韻》烏侯切，平侯，影。］
“区2”的繁体字。
(1)量器名。
(2)古代农民播种时所开的穴或沟谓之“区”。
(3)见“區2脱”。
(4)姓。汉有区博。见《汉书·王莽传中》。
[③]［gōu］
［《集韻》居侯切，平矦，見。］
通“句1”。“区3”的繁体字。
弯曲。
[④]［kòu］
［《集韻》丘切，去，溪。］
“区4”的繁体字。
见“區4霿”。
[⑤]［qiū］
［《集韻》祛尤切，平尤，溪。］
通“丘1”。“区5

區字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匸字部】　區； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页155第13
【唐韻】豈俱切【集韻】【韻會】虧于切【正韻】丘于切，?音驅。【說文】藏隱也。从品在匸中。品，衆也。【徐曰】凡言區者，皆有所藏也。【荀子·大略篇】言之信者，在乎區蓋之閒。【註】區，藏物處。又【前漢·揚雄傳】有田一廛，宅一區。【張敞傳】敞以耳目，發起賊主，名區處。【註】師古曰：區，謂居止之所也。又【韻會】區者，小室之名。【前漢·胡建傳】穿北軍壘，以爲賈區。【註】師古曰：區者，小屋之名，若今小菴屋之類。故衞士之屋謂之區。又【論語】區以別矣。【朱註】區，猶類也。【韓愈·別趙子詩】人心未嘗同，不可一理區。又【爾雅·釋器】玉十謂之區。【郭註】雙玉曰瑴，五瑴爲區。又區區，小貌。【前漢·楚元王傳】豈爲區區之禮哉。【註】師古曰：區區，謂小也。【禮·樂志】河閒區區小國。又【集韻】【韻會】?祛尤切，音丘。域也。【增韻】分也，阜也。【韻會】曲禮，不嫌諱名，謂宇與禹，丘與區。禹宇二字，其音不別。丘之與區，今讀則異。然尋古語，其聲亦同。【陸士衡詩】普厥丘宇。又晉閣名所載若干

區字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
區字的起名意思

暂无。

Area
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" Qi Juqi, Pingyu, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "区1".
(1) Concealment.
(2) Area. A place or category with certain boundaries.
(3) Administrative division units.
(4) Refers to the district government and its location.
(5) Housing.
(6) Specifically refers to the cabin.
(7) Border; border field.
(8) Difference; division.
(9) Small and tiny.
(10) Quantifiers. The five pairs of white jade are called "zones".
(11) Quantifiers. Place; place.
(12) Quantifiers. Seat; respect.
(13) Through "drive".
[②] [ōu]
["Guangyun" Wuhou cut, Pinghou, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "区2".
(1) The name of the measuring instrument.
(2) The holes or ditch opened by the ancient farmers when sowing seeds are called "zones".
(3) See "Zone 2 off".
(4) Last name. There is a district blog in Han Dynasty. See "Han Shu·Wang Mang Biography".
[③] [gōu]
["Jiyun" Ju Houqie, Ping Yu, see you. ]
Same as "句1". Traditional characters for "区3".
bending.
[④]［kòu］
["Ji Yun" Qiu cut, go to, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "区4".
See "Zone 4".
[⑤]［qiū］
["Ji Yun" Qu Youqie, Pingyou, Xi. ]
Same as "Mound 1". "District 5

[Subset 2] [匸字部] 　 District; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 155-13
[Tang Yun] Qi Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Lose to cut [Zheng Yun] Qiu Yuqie, sound drive. [Said the text] Hidden and hidden. Congpin is in 匸中. Goods, all too. [Xu Yue] Everyone who speaks a different opinion has something to hide. [Xunzi·A Brief Introduction] Those who believe in words care about the leisure of the district cover. [Note] District, storage area. Also [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] There is a small town in Arita, a district in the house. [Zhang Chang Biography] Open to the ears and eyes, to initiate the thief, and be famous. [Note] Shigu said: District is also the place of residence. Also [Rhyme Club] District, the name of the small room. [Previous Han·Hu Jian Chuan] Passing through the North Military Base, thinking of Jia District. [Note] Shigu said: District person, the name of the hut, such as the small house. Therefore, the house of the guards is called the district. Also 【The Analects of Confucius】Different distinctions. [Zhu Note] District, it is also like class. [Han Yu·Bie Zhao Zishi] People's hearts are not the same, so we can't be the same. Also 【Erya·Release Device】The area of ten words of jade. [Guo's Note] Double jade is called 瑴, and Wu 瑴 is a district. It's trivial and small. [Previous Han·Chu Yuan Wang Biography] It is a mere courtesy. [Note] Shi Gu said: District, that is, Xiaoye. 【Rite·Lezhi】Small country in Hexian District. Also 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Qu Youqie, Yinqiu. Domain also. 【Zeng Yun】Fen Ye, Fu Ye. [Rhyme Club] Quli, without ignoring the name, said Yu and Yu, Qiu and District. The sound of the word Yuyu is different. Qiu Zhiyu District, today's reading is different. However, looking for the old saying, the sound is the same. [Poems by Lu Shiheng] Pu Jue Qiuyu. Something contained in the name of Youjin Pavilion
